name: White Pearl
description: White Pearl is a free RPG made using RPGMaker VXAce, with the Luna Engine add-on (to assist with customising the engine further), created by indie developer Harry Gill. The game's story revolves around destroying a cycle of cataclysmic events of the world, known as Dark Eras, which change/rebirth the world after each Era. The protagonist, Pearlto, is given the White Pearl to end the Priori, and stop the cycle. White Pearl features a turn-based battle system where players utilise skills with various effects with cooldowns and charge times. Players must also utilise enemy elemental weaknesses and debuffs/buffs to their advantages. White Pearl's gameplay also involves side quests and side content, and a crafting system.
